New Records: India posted their highest T20I score in Sri Lanka of 213/7
Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav scored a breathtaking 58 off 26 balls
Pathum Nissanka top-scoring with his sensational innings of 79 (48)
Arshdeep Singh (2/24, 3 overs), Axar Patel (2/38) picked two wickets each
Post-Match Reflections: India beat Sri Lanka by 43 runs in the first T20I of the three-match series
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka got their chase off to a terrific start as openers Pathum Nissanka and Kusal Mendis added 84 runs for the first wicket off 52 balls
Others: Rishabh Pant finds form after long time
Matheesha Pathirana was the pick of the bowlers for the hosts with figures of 4/40 in four overs
